评论概述: Product was okay quality for the price. Avoid if you have a larger build.
评论详情: I had ordered the dark plum/brown color of the gloves. Good things about the process is that the items arrived on time, and were well packaged. The color of the gloves was exactly how I’d seen it advertised on the site, which was good. The problems I had with the gloves were that the material had runs in it when it arrived and there were lots of loose strings. The material was thinner and coarser than what I’d thought, which was that it was a material similar to a tube sock. Additionally, the size was much too small for my build and the fabric didn’t stretch at all.  Honestly, I would have kept the gloves and asked for another un-damaged pair if they weren’t just too small and had more give to fit my arms. I would recommend these only if you’re a small person or a child.
I got these for my 10-year-old granddaughter. She loves them and wears them all the time. I was worried they would be too big, but they fit great.

评论概述: Seams are exposed and tear easily
评论详情: I ordered this product the first time and had to return it because the area near the tag had a hole in it. I figured no big deal, I'll just get another one.  The second time I received this product, once again, the tag was poorly (tied in?) and despite being very cautious and using scissors, it still left a hole, though it was very small so I left it. I put them on, and noticed that on my right arm, you could see the stitches for each row and its loop. As I rub my finger over it, it just makes it worse, so it's very loosely sewn together. My left arm didn't have as noticeable stitching issues, though they existed.  There are many areas where the threads aren't uniform with the colors and are obvious that they weren't sewn properly.  Overall, these looked really cute to get, and I was excited to receive them, but I'll be turning the second pair also and finding something else to get.
